name: nicodinus/illuminate-filesystem
description: Nicodinus fork of the Illuminate Filesystem package.

suggest.league/flysystem: Required to use the Flysystem local and FTP drivers (^2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Required to use the Flysystem cache (^2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (^2.0).
suggest.psr/http-message: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0)
